summary: K in "4k" should be capitalized
Zombified piglins no longer make angry sounds when hostile toward a non-player entity
Superflat biome selection overrides block selection on "Create New World" screen

Glitched skin while swimming (left hand)
/seed availiable to all players on multiplayer server
Ender dragon death animation suddenly flashes right after it has ended
Wolves only use their hostile appearance after being attacked

Newly spawned Zombified Piglins do not pick up the aggro of older spawned aggravated Zombified Piglins
Villagers don't show angry particles when hit
Bees stay angry far longer
"b" in Go back isn't capitalized
"d" in Reset to default isn't capitalized
[Crash] "java.lang.IllegalStateException: Unregistered dimension type"
Demo world not saving after saving and quitting then quiting out of minecraft
White squares when in first person with fabulous video settings and F1
Piglins constantly picking up gold nuggets and dropping them
Dolphins with NoAI:1b can drown
Piglins and Hoglins shake in the nether on servers
Mobs do not drop rare drop items when killed by a player in Creative Mode
The advancement "Two by Two" can be achieved by just breeding turtles
Mobs that flee when hit no longer flee after being hit by a player in creative
Enchantment glint does not render for certain things on "Fabulous" setting
Mobs killed in creative mode don't drop experience

Held item is invisible in inventory menu
Particles and clouds not rendering properly behind stained glass and solid blocks
/seed is no longer available without cheats enabled
Lighting in the End dimension is much darker when on a server

Netherite recipes show up in crafting table despite requiring a smithing table to use

"Superflat Customization" screen resets every time you open it and does not show previously saved settings
Lily pad placement in creative mode causes item on hotbar to flicker/vanish
Swimming up on the side of flowing water no longer prevents the player from drowning

"b" & "l" in Create Backup & Load isn't capitalized
"m" in Safe Mode button isn't capitalized
Pigs are moving very slowly

When you stop swimming, "diving underwater" sound occurs and vision flashes

Piglin head and torso floats and detaches during celebration dance

Maps reset on upgrade
sync-chunk-writes often takes over a minute to close a world

Game crashes after generating multiple worlds in succession
Swapping json data for dimensions via custom world breaks portals
Newline in tellraw adds a space at the beginning of the new line
You can spawn in the bedrock ceiling of a Caves world
[Crash] "java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking memory connection" on loading a dimension with debug chunk generator

'/spreadplayers under' does not prevent invalid values

nether fortress mobs no longer spawn in extended bounding box
